languages.text: "Я думала просто отказаться... но все же рада, что слова истины прозвучали". {n}Ирлиэт обменивается понимающими взглядами с Маражаем.{/n}
"I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я думала просто отказаться... но все же рада, что слова истины прозвучали". {n}Ирлиэт обменивается понимающими взглядами с Маражаем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I was meaning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}
"I was meaning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}
"I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}
"I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}
"I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}
"I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}

languages.text: “若换做是我，我只会一言不发地拒绝……但我还是很高兴，因为终于有人说出了实话。”{n}伊莉耶特与玛拉斋会意地互视一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “若换做是我，我只会一言不发地拒绝……但我还是很高兴，因为终于有人说出了实话。”{n}伊莉耶特与玛拉斋会意地互视一眼。{/n}

languages.text: 「ただ断るつもりだったけど…それでも、真実が語られたってことで安心してるよ」{n}ユリエットとマラズハイは、意味ありげな視線を交わした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ただ断るつもりだったけど…それでも、真実が語られたってことで安心してるよ」{n}ユリエットとマラズハイは、意味ありげな視線を交わした。{/n}

languages.text: «Tenía pensado rechazarlo sin más... pero me alegra que alguien haya dicho la verdad». {n}Yrliet y Marazhai intercambian una mirada de complicidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tenía pensado rechazarlo sin más... pero me alegra que alguien haya dicho la verdad». {n}Yrliet y Marazhai intercambian una mirada de complicidad.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben de uzatmadan reddedecektim... Fakat gerçeğin ifade edilmesine memnun oldum." {n}Yrliet ve Marazhai, anlamlı bakışlarla birbirlerine bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben de uzatmadan reddedecektim... Fakat gerçeğin ifade edilmesine memnun oldum." {n}Yrliet ve Marazhai, anlamlı bakışlarla birbirlerine bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « J'avais l'intention de simplement refuser... mais je suis néanmoins heureuse que quelqu'un ait eu le courage de dire la vérité. » {n}Yrliet et Marazhai échangent des regards entendus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'avais l'intention de simplement refuser... mais je suis néanmoins heureuse que quelqu'un ait eu le courage de dire la vérité. » {n}Yrliet et Marazhai échangent des regards entendus.{/n}

languages.text: "Eigentlich wollte ich einfach ablehnen ... aber ich freue mich, dass die Wahrheit ausgesprochen wurde. {n}Yrliet und Marazhai tauschen wissende Blicke aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was planning to simply refuse... but I am nonetheless glad that the truth has been spoken." {n}Yrliet and Marazhai exchange knowing glances.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eigentlich wollte ich einfach ablehnen ... aber ich freue mich, dass die Wahrheit ausgesprochen wurde. {n}Yrliet und Marazhai tauschen wissende Blicke aus.{/n}
